headline: Missouri American Water Signs Agreement to Purchase Neosho Water and Wastewater System
summary: ST. LOUIS, September 24, 2025--Missouri American Water, a subsidiary of American Water (NYSE: AWK) announced today it has signed an agreement with the City of Neosho to purchase the water and wastewater systems for $34.5 million. The agreement was submitted today to the Missouri Public Service Commission (PSC) following unanimous approval from the Neosho City Council. The Neosho system provides water and wastewater services for approximately 5,400 customer connections.
